http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/tags/java/Recent content in Java on Jeff SmithHugo -- gohugo.ioen-usWed, 24 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000
Sparkjava or tomcat slow to start on cloud VMhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/sparkjava-or-tomcat-slow-to-start-on-cloud-vm/Wed, 24 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/sparkjava-or-tomcat-slow-to-start-on-cloud-vm/There might not be enough entropy from /dev/random causing blocking. Use a software solution like Haveged. Install haveged on ubuntu: sudo apt-get install haveged Check entropy on linux with: cat /proc/sys/kernel/random/entropy_avail
How to set the default java on archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/how-to-set-the-default-java-on-arch/Wed, 30 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/how-to-set-the-default-java-on-arch/archlinux-java status archlinux-java set java-8-jdk
Intellij disable change.laf.on.editor.theme.changehttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/intellij-disable-change.laf.on.editor.theme.change/Sun, 20 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/intellij-disable-change.laf.on.editor.theme.change/Disable idea’s automatic look and feel switching when changing color schemes. Open .IntelliJIdea2017.2/config/options/options.xml Edit
Change java version on ubuntuhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-java-version-on-ubuntu/Mon, 01 Aug 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-java-version-on-ubuntu/List: sudo update-alternatives --list java sudo update-alternatives --list javac Add to available: sudo update-alternatives --install "/usr/bin/java" "java" "/usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.7.0_45/bin/java" 1 sudo update-alternatives --install "/usr/bin/javac" "javac" "/usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.7.0_45/bin/javac" 1 Change version: sudo update-alternatives --config java sudo update-alternatives --config javac From https://stackoverflow.com/questions/21115133/ubuntu-change-the-path-from-openjdk-6-to-oracle-jdk-7
